Judul: CHINA���S PLACE AMONG THE STARS The FAST telescope dish, stretching half a kilometre, will thrust China���s radio astronomers into a role of global leadership. Once in use, the scientsists behind FAST intend for it to be as open as possible to use by researchers around the world. XINHUA NEWS AGENCY/SHUTT
Abstrak:
Nestled amongst the karst mountains of southwestern China lies a gargantuan
spherical dish that fills a valley — the world’s single largest radio telescope. Completed in 2016, the Five-hundred-meter Aperture Spherical Radio Telescope (FAST) is being fine-tuned and will soon be fully operational
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
